original_text: And they tarried till they were ashamed: and, behold, he opened not the doors of the parlour; therefore they took a key, and opened them: and, behold, their lord was fallen down dead on the earth.
korean_text: 그들이 오래 기다려도 왕이 다락문들을 열지 아니하는지라 열쇠를 가지고 열어 본즉 그들의 군주가 이미 땅에 엎드러져 죽었더라

sentences.original_text: And they tarried till they were ashamed
and, behold, he opened not the doors of the parlour
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 보라, 그가 응접실의 문을 열지 않았다

sentences.original_text: and, behold, their lord was fallen down dead on the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 보라, 그들의 주인이 땅에 쓰러져 죽어 있었다
